item.title: Adding shops... please help
item.dc:creator: @boxman222 boxman222
item.description:
@boxman222 wrote:

ok im using jaywalker shop maker.

heres my coding [Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 gloves 1 1 7461 100000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 3307 9373 0 0 0 0 0 1 we_sell_gloves!

ok when i put the
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}
i get client.java:19433: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (NPCID == 520) { // gloves shop
^ that when i compile.

what is wrong???

Read full topic
